bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with bai tu 白禿 , white baldness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hu ma 胡麻 quotes Pu ji fang 普濟方 : 梅花禿癬：用清油一碗，以小竹子燒火入內煎沸，瀝豬膽汁一個和 勻，剃頭擦之，二三日即愈 , “For plum blossom baldness and xuan -illness : take one bowl of clear oil and pour into a [vessel] that is then to be heated with young bamboo until it boils. Then pour the juice of a hog’s bile into [the oil] and mix. Shave [the patient’s] head and rub [the liquid] onto it”.
